@soumith conda activate will introduce environment variables that start with "CONDA".
We could specialize more on something like "CONDA_PREFIX", but the assumption is that if someone has an environment variable starting with "CONDA" in their environment it is worth looking at. We merely use this as a hint and don't rely on the path actually existing.

body:
@soumith conda activate will introduce environment variables that start with "CONDA". 
We could specialize more on something like "CONDA_PREFIX", but the assumption is that if someone has an environment variable starting with "CONDA" in their environment it is worth looking at. We merely use this as a hint and [don't](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/15b12e6f8aa9ba97881ff189d904fadea65d72ca/tools/setup_helpers/mkldnn.py#L54) [rely](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/108f5c197fa71883948ea95ec0d5a609e737c066/tools/setup_helpers/nccl.py#L55) [on](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/108f5c197fa71883948ea95ec0d5a609e737c066/tools/setup_helpers/cudnn.py#L41) [the](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/cd86d4c5548c15e0bc9773565fa4fad73569f948/tools/setup_helpers/dist_check.py#L89) path actually existing.
